content: wall basket sizes small large 4 = 6 row 12 double_crochet stitches gauge 10cm = 6 row 12 double_crochet stitches ➢ caron big cakes ○ 603yds 551m 300g 10 58oz materials ➢ k/10 5/6 50 mm ➢ h/8/5 00 mm stitch marker notions yarn needle to weave in ends chain single_crochet double_crochet slip stitches stitch single_crochet decrease chain = chain stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet guide slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease = decrease pattern body using larger hook 10 half_double_crochet into magic_ring double_crochet 5 8 rounds tighten and close the ring slip_stitch the last double_crochet of the 5th round to the first double_crochet 1 2 half_double_crochet in each double_crochet around 20 switch to smaller hook 17 34 single_crochet 11 16 single_crochet 2 *half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 30 decrease 17 34 single_crochet 3 *2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 40 single_crochet around until 2 3 sts left chain 8 12 4 *3 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 50 skip last 2 3 single_crochet and first 2 3 single_crochet of nxt round 5 *4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 60 single_crochet around to chain 8 12 single_crochet in chain slip_stitch into row for small basket move to instructions for body below on wrong side of work 6 5 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 70 bind off weave in ends 7 6 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 80 8 7 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in nxt st repeat from * around 90 move to instructions for body yarncraze@gmail com / yarncraze etsy com / ig yarncraze / twitter yarncraze / facebook com/yarncraze 1
